title: Former One Direction Star Liam Payne Found Dead In Argentina
content: British singer Liam Payne, former member of the group One Direction, died Wednesday aged 31 after falling from the third floor of a hotel in Argentina, police in Buenos Aires said.
summary: British singer Liam Payne, former member of the group One Direction, died Wednesday aged 31 after falling from the third floor of a hotel in Argentina, police in Buenos Aires said.

title: "As We Had Said, No Evidence Whatsoever": India On Trudeau's Deposition
content: In a late night post by the Ministry of External Affairs, India affirmed its stand on the massive diplomatic row with Canada. The foreign ministry responded to the latest remarks by Justin Trudeau who testified before a public Commission of Inquiry.
summary: In a late night post by the Ministry of External Affairs, India affirmed its stand on the massive diplomatic row with Canada. The foreign ministry responded to the latest remarks by Justin Trudeau who testified before a public Commission of Inquiry.

title: Trump Calls Himself "Father Of IVF" At All-Women Town Hall
content: Donald Trump called himself the "father of IVF" at a town hall for women voters on Wednesday, as the Republican presidential candidate tries to convince the crucial voting bloc they can trust him on reproductive issues.
summary: Donald Trump called himself the "father of IVF" at a town hall for women voters on Wednesday, as the Republican presidential candidate tries to convince the crucial voting bloc they can trust him on reproductive issues.

title: US President Joe Biden Announces $425 Million Arms Aid To Ukraine
content: US President Joe Biden announced a $425 million arms package for Kyiv Wednesday in a call with President Volodymyr Zelensky, ahead of a farewell visit to Berlin to discuss Ukraine, the White House said.
summary: US President Joe Biden announced a $425 million arms package for Kyiv Wednesday in a call with President Volodymyr Zelensky, ahead of a farewell visit to Berlin to discuss Ukraine, the White House said.

title: 16 Killed As Israel Strikes Municipal Buildings In Southern Lebanon
content: Lebanon's health ministry on Wednesday said 16 people were killed and 52 others wounded in Israeli strikes on municipal buildings in the southern city of Nabatiyeh, revising upwards an earlier toll.
summary: Lebanon's health ministry on Wednesday said 16 people were killed and 52 others wounded in Israeli strikes on municipal buildings in the southern city of Nabatiyeh, revising upwards an earlier toll.

title: Hezbollah Launches Rockets At Israel In Response To Raids
content: Hezbollah said it fired rockets at the northern Israeli town of Safed on Wednesday, the third such attack in 24 hours which the Lebanese armed group described as a response to Israeli raids.
summary: Hezbollah said it fired rockets at the northern Israeli town of Safed on Wednesday, the third such attack in 24 hours which the Lebanese armed group described as a response to Israeli raids.

title: Cholera Case Confirmed in Lebanon, Risk Of Spread "Very High": WHO
content: The risk of cholera spreading in Lebanon is "very high", the World Health Organization warned Wednesday, after a case of the acute and potentially deadly diarrhoeal infection was detected in the conflict-hit country.
summary: The risk of cholera spreading in Lebanon is "very high", the World Health Organization warned Wednesday, after a case of the acute and potentially deadly diarrhoeal infection was detected in the conflict-hit country.

title: 3 Indian-Origin Candidates Shortlisted For Oxford Chancellor's Post
content: The University of Oxford today announced the final candidates for their Chancellor election. Three Indian-origin individuals are among the 38 finalists, but former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan was not included.
summary: The University of Oxford today announced the final candidates for their Chancellor election. Three Indian-origin individuals are among the 38 finalists, but former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan was not included.

title: US Deployment of Nuclear Arms In Japan Would Destabilise Region: Russia
content: Any deployment of US nuclear weapons to Japan in the framework of an "Asian NATO" would lead to a collapse in regional stability, Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said on Wednesday.
summary: Any deployment of US nuclear weapons to Japan in the framework of an "Asian NATO" would lead to a collapse in regional stability, Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said on Wednesday.

title: French President's Israel Creation Comment Sparks Blacklash From Israel PM
content: French President Emmanuel Macron has further strained tense relations with Israel with a comment referring o the creation of the Israeli state, a verbal jab that was rapidly denounced by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu as distorting history.
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron has further strained tense relations with Israel with a comment referring o the creation of the Israeli state, a verbal jab that was rapidly denounced by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu as distorting history.

title: Israeli Strike On Hezbollah Kills 6, Including Mayor In Southern Lebanon
content: Israel carried out dozens of strikes on Hezbollah targets in Lebanon on Wednesday, killing a city mayor, toppling buildings and causing widespread destruction in several southern areas.
summary: Israel carried out dozens of strikes on Hezbollah targets in Lebanon on Wednesday, killing a city mayor, toppling buildings and causing widespread destruction in several southern areas.

title: 100-Year-Old Jimmy Carter Casts Historic Vote For Kamala Harris
content: Former US President Jimmy Carter, who recently turned a hundred, announced that he is voting for Kamala Harris and that is what he really cares about, dismissing his age-related milestone moment as "just another birthday".
summary: Former US President Jimmy Carter, who recently turned a hundred, announced that he is voting for Kamala Harris and that is what he really cares about, dismissing his age-related milestone moment as "just another birthday".

title: Putin Seeks BRICS Group's Support Against Western Pressure
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin will host a summit of BRICS leaders next week, seeking support in his standoff with the West from the expanded group that now represents about a third of global economic output.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin will host a summit of BRICS leaders next week, seeking support in his standoff with the West from the expanded group that now represents about a third of global economic output.

title: France Bars Israeli Exhibition At Defense Show Amid Dispute Over Gaza
content: Israeli delegations taking part in the major Euronaval defence show in France next month will not be permitted to set up any stand or exhibit hardware following a decision by the French government, organisers said on Wednesday.
summary: Israeli delegations taking part in the major Euronaval defence show in France next month will not be permitted to set up any stand or exhibit hardware following a decision by the French government, organisers said on Wednesday.

title: Russia Slams Zelensky's 'Victory Plan', Accuses Him Of Provoking NATO
content: Russia on Wednesday denounced a "victory plan" presented by Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, saying he was trying to push NATO into a direct conflict with Moscow.
summary: Russia on Wednesday denounced a "victory plan" presented by Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, saying he was trying to push NATO into a direct conflict with Moscow.

title: US Man Killed In Front Of His 3 Children During Road Rage Dispute
content: Giddens was arrested and now faces charges of murder and three counts of first-degree attempted murder.
summary: Giddens was arrested and now faces charges of murder and three counts of first-degree attempted murder.

title: Gaza Mother Mourns Son Killed In Israeli Strike Before 2nd Polio Vaccine
content: Holding his teddy bear, Gazan mother Asmaa al-Wasifi mourned her 10-year-old son, who was killed in an Israeli strike before he could take his second polio shot.
summary: Holding his teddy bear, Gazan mother Asmaa al-Wasifi mourned her 10-year-old son, who was killed in an Israeli strike before he could take his second polio shot.

title: UK Photojournalist Stabbed To Death By Teenage Son In US: Police
content: The 61-year-old had suffered a fatal stab wound to the neck, according to records from the Los Angeles County Medical Examiner.
summary: The 61-year-old had suffered a fatal stab wound to the neck, according to records from the Los Angeles County Medical Examiner.

title: "If Good Neighbourliness Is Missing...": S Jaishankar's Swipe At China, Pak
content: Speaking about the challenges faced in the region, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar in his address at the SCO Summit in Islamabad today made a veiled reference about China and Pakistan.
summary: Speaking about the challenges faced in the region, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar in his address at the SCO Summit in Islamabad today made a veiled reference about China and Pakistan.

title: Taiwan Woman Allegedly Kills Boy, 2, After Beating Him For A Week
content: An influencer in Taiwan who touted herself as a "caring" mother of five has been accused of abusing and killing a 2-year-old boy under her care.
summary: An influencer in Taiwan who touted herself as a "caring" mother of five has been accused of abusing and killing a 2-year-old boy under her care.
